definitions.definition: cook (food, especially meat) by prolonged exposure to heat in an oven or over a fire.
examples: she was going to roast a leg of lamb for Sunday dinner
she checked the meat roasting in the oven

definitions.definition: process (a foodstuff, metal ore, etc.) by subjecting it to intense heat.
examples: coffee beans are roasted and ground

definitions.definition: make or become very warm, especially by exposure to the heat of the sun or a fire.
examples: the fire was hot enough to roast anyone who stood close to it
if you waste his time he'll roast you

definitions.definition: offer a mocking tribute to (someone) at a roast.
